proposal: #517 - Polkadot Desktop Wallet Tutorial by Altcoin Daily
rationale: Altcoin Daily aims to create a tutorial of Talisman wallet for 5,986 DOT.
details: After watching those low-quality videos produced for the pricetag of 21,219 DOT as a result of referendum #255, we must say NAY to this proposal.

rationale: This proposal is a sponsorship for Conor Daly to race in 3 professional series, including Indianapolis 500, NASCAR Truck Series, and Nitro Rallycross.
details: This proposal presents a unique opportunity to elevate Polkadot's visibility on a global stage through high-profile racing events.

proposal: #507 - Polkadot Community Workspace NYC by Transistor
rationale: Transistor aims to lease and run co-working space in Manhattan, NYC, for 3 years. They want to build strong Polkadot community in there.
details: The ROI of this proposal is huge, NYC is one of the most important business development hubs in the world. We are in favor of this referenda, Transistor team has proven track and Polkadot will benefit from this.

proposal: #506 - The Decentralized Future of Business Development for Polkadot
rationale: Missing link wants to source, screen, select, and successfully place 5 BD executives with the W3F's Decentralized Futures program.
details: Business development is essential for the expansion of Web3 protocols like Polkadot, so we are in favor of this proposal, finding best people possible is a good goal for this proposal. AYE.

proposal: #343 - Set BEEFY genesis (thus starting BEEFY consensus on Kusama)
rationale: This sets BEEFY genesis to the next block after it executes, thus enabling BEEFY consensus on Kusama.
details: Enabling BEEFY consensus on Kusama sets the stage for the Kusama<>Ethereum Snowfork bridge. Very beneficial for Kusama and later for Polkadot. AYE.

rationale: By that referendum approved, HydraDX will add CRU token from Crust to the Omnipool.
details: Having CRU from Crust in the Omnipool will boost the usage of the token and add the total TVL of the Omnipool.
